author: Special Correspondent
text:
Researchers working on developments in Information and Communications Technology (ICT) are invited to send papers for the International Conference on Emerging Technologies, Networking and Computational Intelligence (ICETNCI-16) to be held on March 28 in Chennai. The conference is being organised by Dhumra Mahate Information and Communication Technology Associates, a group focussing on industrial and academic ICT research.

The ICETNCI series aims to provide researchers, industry experts and academics a platform to report on emerging areas in technology and their applications in boosting industrial productivity.

The event is being held in association with PMC Tech, Hosur. Manuscripts must be mailed toicetnci@dmicta.orgby March 16. For more details, visitdmicta.org/conference.html.
title: Papers invited for conference
